description:
Max.Speed 10000rpm（7490xg）;
OLED display，may switch speed and time;
DC motor drive，smooth and quiet operation；
Safe,endurable and robust rotor with clamp locking design，easy to operate；
Wide voltage technology：the speed is not affected by voltage fluctuations，high speed accuracy；
Compatible with 0.5/1.5/2mL×12 tubes+4×PCR8 strips，0.2mL×44 PCR tubes; 
Screen buttons can adjust the start/stop of the motor，supports both soft braking and instant stop modes；
Simple appearance and structure，only weight 1.5Kg.
PRODUCT PARAMETERS
Cat.No.
9021001331
Max. Speed
10000rpm
Max. RCF
6708×g-1.5/2mL； 6596-7490×g-PCR8 strips
Rotor Capacity
0.2mL×44 PCR tubes 0.5/1.5/2mL×12+ 0.2mLPCR 8 strips×4
Run Time
10s-20min
Driving Motor DC motor
DC motor
Power Requirements
AC100-240V/50Hz/60Hz 40W
Noise Level
≤58dB
Dimension [D×W×H]
210×180×130mm
Weight
1.5kg MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Centrifuges in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional Centrifuges with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
